#summary Introduction

= Introduction =

SPE is a server plugin for VALVe source games that is geared towards python scripters. It allows for unprecedented access to the internals of the Source Engine, giving scripters never before seen power.

= About SPE =
  * [http://forums.eventscripts.com/viewtopic.php?f=81&t=29657 Download SPE] from the Eventscipts forums.
  * [Features SPE Features] - Read about how you can benefit from using SPE on your server.
  * [Faq SPE FAQ] - View frequently asked questions regarding SPE.
  * [KnownIssues Known Issues] - Read about any known issues with SPE.

= Requirements =
  * A working installation of [http://www.srcds.com/ SRCDS].
  * A working installation of [http://www.eventscripts.com/pages/EventScripts Eventscripts].

= Documentation =
  * [FunctionRef Function Reference] - Information about SPE functions.
